titleStmt.title: An answer to A letter from Dr. Bray directed to such as have contributed towards the propagating Christian knowledge in the plantations. By Joseph Wyeth.
titleStmt.author: Wyeth, Joseph, 1663-1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle, in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-street,

notesStmt.note: The letter by Thomas Bray was printed in 1700 (cf. Wing), and was related to missionary work in the colony of Maryland.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
